_comment: Created by ianb on 27/04/2015 18:00:28 using v2.5
title: How has the frequency of MRSA infections changed?
analysis_commentary: In 2007, the level of hospital acquired MRSA infections also became a major national concern, similar to C difficile. The reduction in the number of MRSA cases has followed a similar trajectory to that of C Difficile with an 81% reduction in all reported cases between 2007 and 2014, and a 77% reduction in trust apportioned cases between 2008 and 2014.
data_source: Health Protection Agency, Mandatory surveillance of bacteraemia
